name: A Way Back Home
description:
This is a game I made for a group assignment at University, the aim was to make a serious game that teaches the player a skill and tracks metrics of that learning. My group and I designed the game around teaching young children the basic skills of orienteering. The game was created with MonoGame and art was created with Maya

I did the programming for the UI, Gameplay, the design for the main engine systems and created the 3D models, textures and audio

Please forgive the cringy opening scene, I recorded the audio for it about 30 minutes before we had to present the project :P
